pageProduct.name: Vicks Action Cold and Flu Day and Night Relief 24 Pack
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vicks Action Cold & Flu provides day and night relief from 6 cold and flu symptoms: Blocked Nose, Headache, Runny Nose, Sneezing, Sore Throat Pain, Reduces Fever.

Vicks Action Cold and Flu provides day and night relief from 6 cold and flu symptoms:

- Blocked Nose

- Headache

- Runny Nose

- Sneezing

- Sore Throat Pain

- Reduces Fever

Who can use this?

Adult & Children 12 years and over.

How Many should be taken:

2 day tablets in the morning and 2 in the afternoon as required. 2 Night tablets at bedtime as required. Leave 4 to 6 hours between doses.

How should it be taken:

Take with a glass of water.

Do not exceed:

Day tablets: Maximum 4 tablets in 24 hours. Night tablets: Maximum 2 tablets in 24 hours. Keep to the recommended dose.

How long to take it for:

Adults: Do not take this medicine for longer than a days at a time unless advised to do so by a doctor.

Children & Adolescents (12-17 years): Do not take longer than 48 hours at a time, unless advised by a doctor.

Not to given to children under 12 years

Suitable For: Adult & Children 12 years and over

Product Claims: Day and night relief from 6 cold and flu symptoms

Size: 24 Tablets

Directions

Ask your doctor or pharmacist before you take it:
You have high blood pressure or heart problems or are taking antidepressant medication.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Keep in a dry, dark place.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
